messages.subject: just for fun ...
messages.msgSnippet: ... my boys have really enjoyed watching the weatherbug over the past few wks and I thought I d pass it along ... it s free and all you do is plug in your area
messages.messageBody:
... my boys have really enjoyed watching the weatherbug over the past few
wks and I thought I'd pass it along ... it's free and all you do is plug in
your area ... have fun :)

dh just came home (he's a railroad engineer) ... he said the temperature
inside of his train registered @ 118* but it's a DRY HEAT :I

http://kmol.com/weather/weatherbug/

Pris ~> who'z going to join her dh who'z standing in front of the FREEZER
trying to COOL OFF!!! BLAH :P
WARNING: I cannot be help responsible for the above, as apparently my cats
have learned how to type ...
